name: Midas' Cursed Treasure
description:
In this game, you play as a treasure hunter, who finds Midas' cursed treasure. You get trapped inside, and to get out, you need to fight your way through Midas' minions and assistants.
The game features 3 levels, themed around bronze, silver and gold. Each level has a unique type of enemy, as well as a unique boss fight. In every level, you need to collect a key, to unlock the boss fight. once the boss is defeated, you will be rewarded with one of its abilities.
How to play:
Move: A and D
Jump: W or Space
Attack: Left Click (point with mouse)
Your primary attack is to throw coins. You can hold up to 10 coins at a time. You get coins by killing enemies. All other controls will be explained in the game, when you unlock them.
No assets were made before the game jam. Everything, including code, art and sound, was developed during the jam.
The game was made by:
Viggo Foldager-Jensen
Zicrus
As a submission to the Kalorian Game Jam.
